Ryan Watters

Content and coding for this site is currently in development and scheduled for publication on 2015/12/01.

Once this site is completed, I’ll be including a multi-step, open-source tutorial series on how I built the site using Jekyll, command line tools (including Grunt, Tipue, and possibly lunr.js), CloudFlare, and BrowserStack for testing.

Although final content for site launch has yet to be published on the live site, I would like to extend a special thank you to BrowserStack for helping me during the testing phase of development. If you haven’t used their product, it’s the best option out there for all your cross-browser and cross-platform testing needs.
